name: Sokenzan Bruiser
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

editions.flavor:
"We camped near the Sokenzan Mountains. Though I know its inhabitants are sparse, I hear cries coming from the highest peaks every night, as if the mountains themselves bellow for vengeance."
—Lost Battalion, message to General Takeno

name: Sokenzan Renegade
text:
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more cards in hand than each other player, the player who has the most cards in hand gains control of Sokenzan Renegade.

text:
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)

text:

• Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.

name: Soldevi Adnate
text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

editions.flavor:
"People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then."

name: Soldevi Digger
text: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

editions.flavor:

text:

{1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

editions.flavor: Slow and steady wins the race.
Slow and steady wins the race.

name: Soldevi Heretic
text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"It cannot be Soldev crushed, and my machines to blame?"
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

"In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Machinist
text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.

editions.flavor:
"Perhaps this time the power of the artificers shall be used wisely."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Soldevi Sage
text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.

editions.flavor:
"To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."

Soldevi Machinist

"To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."

text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"Our newfound security enables us to turn more of our attentions to the wonders that lie deep within the soil."

Soldevi Machinist

until they bleed.
